Stable release: Latest stable software release/Auslogics Disk Defrag

Supported platforms: Windows XP and later;Windows Server 2003 and later
Auto defrag when idle: Yes, with name="ScheduleIdle"Windows Task Scheduler "Idle" schedules and options settings will be applied to scheduled tasks.

Scheduler: Yes, with Defragglers GUI only provides an interface to configure defragmenting activity in Windows Task Scheduler.

Supported platforms: Windows NT 4 and later;Windows 95 and later

Scheduler: Condusiv Technologies claims its InvisiTasking technology eliminates the need for scheduled defragmentation.

Supported file systems: FAT16, FAT32, exFAT, NTFS, ReFS* and CSVFS[https://raxco.my.salesforce.com/_ui/selfservice/pkb/PublicKnowledgeSolution/d?orgId=00D30000001FVTK ;id=50130000000irUt ;retURL=%2Fsol%2Fpublic%2Fsolutionbrowser.jsp%3Fsearch%3Dexfat%26cid%3D000000000000000%26orgId%3D00D30000001FVTK%26t%3D4 ;ps=1]
Supported platforms: Windows XP SP3 or higher (x86, x64),Windows 10, Windows Server 2003 SP1,Windows Server 2019[https://raxco.my.salesforce.com/_ui/selfservice/pkb/PublicKnowledgeSolution/d?orgId=00D30000001FVTK ;id=50130000000irUt ;retURL=%2Fsol%2Fpublic%2Fsolutionbrowser.jsp%3Fsearch%3Dexfat%26cid%3D000000000000000%26orgId%3D00D30000001FVTK%26t%3D4 ;ps=1]

Developer: Dmitri Arkhangelski, Justin Dearing, Sayem Chaklader, Stefan Pendl
Script: UltraDefrag can be run in batch scripts and apply several parameters separately for each disk.
Stable release: Latest stable software release/UltraDefrag, Open source version discontinued
